'''Gilbarad''' was the father of [[Ivorwen]], and [[Aragorn]]'s maternal great-grandfather.<ref>{{PM|Aii}}, p. 263</ref>

== Etymology ==
''Gilbarad'' is a [[Sindarin]] name. Its meaning is not glossed, but Paul Strack suggests that it contains the elements ''[[gil]]'' ("star; (bright) spark, silver glint, twinkle of light") and ''[[barad]]'' ("tower, great towering building").<ref>{{webcite|author=Paul Strack|articleurl=https://www.eldamo.org/content/words/word-2564320429.html|articlename=S. ''Gilbarad'' m.|website=Eldamo|accessed=19 August 2022}}</ref>
